parameters.name: awsGlueDatabaseName
parameters.description: AWS Glue Database to hold tables for AppFabric Data Analytics

parameters.name: appFabricDataSourceS3URI
parameters.description: The S3 uri of the data source. All folders and files contained in the S3 path are crawled. For example, enter s3://MyBucket/MyFolder/MySubfolder to crawl all objects in MySubfolder within MyBucket

parameters.name: athenaQueryStorageS3URI
parameters.description: The S3 Bucket and Path (s3://MyBucket/Path/) of where Athena should store query results.  Query output will be encrypted using AWS Managed Keys

parameters.name: quicksightAdminUsername
parameters.description: The Quicksight Principal Username copied in step 4.  Should look like Admin/[Quicksight Username]

parameters.name: athenaTable
parameters.description: The name of the Athena table that was generated at 'base' stack deployment
